H0.text: The 'Yid Army' are/were a gang of football hooligans who supported which London club. Arsenal

H1.text: The 'Yid Army' are/were a gang of football hooligans who supported which London club. Chelsea

H2.text: The 'Yid Army' are/were a gang of football hooligans who supported which London club. Fulham

H3.text: The 'Yid Army' are/were a gang of football hooligans who supported which London club. COYS

A4.text: Arsenal fans had also been criticised for continued use of the word 'Yid' in chants.

A5.text: Arsenal fans have been involved in a number of incidents of racist and homophobic abuse at matches over the years.
